required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Burn-out Among Chinese Anaesthesiologist After COVID-19 Pandemic Peak and Its Protective Factor： a National Survey
clinical_study.official_title: Burn-out Among Chinese Anaesthesiologist After COVID-19 Pandemic Peak and Its Protective Factor: a National Survey

brief_summary.textblock:
The investigators proposed a national representative survey to collect data of socio-demographic characteristics, level of exposure to COVID-19, depression，anxiety， ptsd， burnout and resilience of working anaesthesiologists across mainland China for the following purpose
1. Explore the current burn-out rate of Chinese anaesthesiologists and compared it with data acquired in 2015；
2. Explore the perceived covid-19 exposure of COVID-19 among Chinese anaesthesiologist.
3. Explore rate of burnout, anxiety, depression, PTSD symptoms experienced by the participants
4. Explore the protective psychosocial characteristics of burnout. (resilience)
5. See whether covid-19 exposure contribute to higher burn out rate.

primary_outcome.time_frame: data will be retrieved and recored 1 week after survey distribution
primary_outcome.description: Burnout level will be measured by Maslach Burnout Inventory-Human Service Survey

other_outcome.time_frame: data will be retrieved and recored 1 week after survey distribution
other_outcome.description: The Impact of Events Scale-Revised (IES-R) is a self-reporting tool widely used in the field of psychological impact and has been proven to be suitable for the Chinese population

other_outcome.time_frame: data will be retrieved and recored 1 week after survey distribution
other_outcome.description: 10-item Connor-Davidson Resilience Scale (CD-RISC-10) was used to assess resilience.

other_outcome.time_frame: data will be retrieved and recored 1 week after survey distribution
other_outcome.description: The Patient Health Questionnaire-9 (PHQ-9) was included to assess depressive symptoms.

other_outcome.time_frame: data will be retrieved and recored 1 week after survey distribution
other_outcome.description: Anxiety level will be evaluated by GAD-7 Anxiety Scale

intervention.description: psychological inherent resilience and institutional support during COVID-19 outbreak

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
working anaesthesiologist in mainland China
Exclusion Criteria:
-
